textline.p: What kind of feedback would you like to give?
What kind of consequence do you expect?
Describe clearly what has gone wrong.
And this is how you can reproduce it:
You can either host your own multiplayer game, or you can join any of the available games listed below. Note to always make sure that you and your friends are on the same local network.

Note, that Crystal Island is a tech supported learning game. We encourage you to look up from your screen and really engage with other players around the table. You will all be guided thorugh the game.
We never collect personal data from players. However, we hope you will agree to contribute non-personal data about your game session. It will help us to keep improving the game!
Create a new island for your friends to join.
- Make sure you and your friends are in the same local network.
- The language you select will be the one displayed for everyone.
Please indicate if you would like to run for Mayor of Crystal Island.

The Mayor's task is to manage the finances of Crystal Island and to guide the other players through the game. The Mayor will be chosen randomly from those who choose to run. If nobody runs for Mayor, then one will be chosen at random.
You need at least 4 people to play.
We are sure that you will carry this responsibility proudly.

Your task will be to manage the Island's Community Facilities and make sure the Island stays out of debt. Of course, you should also ensure that your Citizens are doing well and that they work together to make the Island prosper.
Recently, a few new Citizens have joined your community. Please ask them to introduce themselves and show them around in the Island.
You still need to solve the following
Would you like to collect taxes from this Citizen?
Would you like to give Financial Support to this Citizen and relieve them from paying taxes this month?
Offers others can buy from you:
Offers others can buy from you:
This is a simple trade offer
You do not have enough money left to make this offer.
You do not have enough free time this month to make this offer.
You do not have enough money to pay for this offer.
You already have that talent. Better luck next time!
Congratulations, you were elected Mayor of Crystal Island! Your task as Mayor is to keep the Island in good shape and care for the well being of your Citizens.
Lead them through difficult dark times.
The better you do your job, the brighter the crystals will shine.
You are a Citizen of Crystal Island! Each month you will need to pay for things to survive, but like in real life you will be confronted with lucky or unlucky events!
Here is your character profile where you can check your income, find out where you live, and what your talents are.
Before we start the game, please try to role play your character and engage with other players as much as possible. Take note of how you feel as you play the game.

Millenia ago, all the Island shone with light. No walls cast shadows. No stars flickered out. We’ve forgotten those times. The Island has fallen into darkness now.Those who thought the light shone for them alone stockpiled it for their own use. When memory forgot the former abundance, the world of contrast came into being. No one simply was, they were and were not.People forgot that energy can be shared. That talent can be used to spread goodness, not hoard it. The Island is dying. Now it’s up to you: Take up your mantle and bring the shared light back into our Island. With your help, we can together change the world.
Your co-players have now gotten their characters. After they are done reading, ask them to introduce themselves!
As the Mayor you need to maintain Community Facilities. Try doing this by clicking on a Community Facility with a symbol on top of it!

You just paid for maintenance cost for this Community Facility! You will need to pay for maintenance every turn. If you can't pay the facility will fall into disrepair. Citizens will suffer and your will continue to go up. Try your best to maintain every facility each month!
Your Citizens help you maintain Community Facilities by paying taxes. When a Citizen pays their taxes a green symbol will appear above their head. Click on the green symbol to collect their taxes!

If a Citizen is having trouble paying their taxes, you have the option of giving them Financial Support. If you choose to provide support, they will receive 500 gold. They will also be excused from paying taxes that month.

You can keep track of the well being of your Citizens by using the Mayor dashboard. Try using it by clicking the arrow on the left! The dashboard shows the talents of each Citizen as well as the problems they are dealing with. Use the dashboard to encourage Citizens to help each other!
You finished all your tasks this month! It's now up to you to lead the Island and coordinate the Citizens.
You can see how your Island is doing at the top left of your screen.
You and your Citizens need to survive for 12 months. The game ends when you do not have enough money to maintain Community Facilities and keep the Citizens happy and healthy.
Tap on the ground to move your character.
Move your character to the fortune wheel to see what fortune has in store for your Island.
Perfect. Now let's wait for all your citizens to do the same.
Tap on the ground to move your character.
Move your character to the wheel of fortune, to see what fortune has in store for you this month!
Perfect. Now let's wait for your friends.
That was lucky! At the beginning of each month you will get to spin the wheel of fortune 2 times!
Click the icons on top of the buildings to resolve your monthly incidents.
Good job! You have resolved all you incidents this month. Click on the End Turn button in the lower right to end your turn.

As a Citizen of Crystal Island, there are several things you need to survive. Each month, you need to pay for food and housing, and you need to pay taxes to help the Mayor maintain Community Facilities that everyone needs.
Uh oh! You weren't so lucky this month.
Something unexpected happened this month. You can pay in gold to resolve this incident, or maybe a fellow Citizen can help you out?
You can now trade with other Citizens! To get started, tap on your character to open the trade menu.
Welcome to the trading menu, here you can create offers that other Citizens can buy. To create an Offer, tap on one of your talents at the bottom of the screen.
You have successfully created offers that other Citizens can buy! They can see your offers above your head. Note that each offer you make uses 10% of your free time.

Well done! You are now offering your talents to help out fellow Citizens! Now let's see if any character is offering a talent that can help you resolve an incident. Who knows, you might even get a discount! Tap on an Offer above a fellow Citizen's head to get started!
You can trade as much as you want each month. Your goal as a Citizen is to survive for 12 months. If you are finished, click on the End Turn button.

The darkness is growing and Community Facilities are starting to close. It looks like your taxes alone are not enough to maintain them. Discuss with your fellow Citizens how you might solve this challenge!

Beat the darkness! The Game ends when the Island falls into darkness. You can bring back the light by supporting each other, paying your taxes, and helping the Mayor to keep Community Facilities working. You only have 12 months to bring back the light and survive! End each month by clicking on the "End Turn" button on the bottom right.

The Island gets lighter when Community Facilities are active and well-maintained. The Mayor needs your taxes to keep Community Facilities working for Citizens. The Mayor collects taxes by clicking on the icon above your head. If your money is low, don't pay your taxes and ask the Mayor for Financial Support!
Some Citizens are already struggling to survive. Your Mayor can support you with Financial Support. But be aware: the more your struggle, the darker the Island gets for everyone.
You may have already noticed that the taxes won't be enough to maintain the Island. That's why you are introducing a new currency: Water Crystals.

In order to deal with financial troubles and growing darkness, the Mayor is introducing a new type of currency: Water Crystals. Water Crystals can be used like Gold to create or buy Offers. Using Water Crystals is another way to share energy and talents to empower each other!

In addition to introducing Water Crystals, the Mayor is asking for your help to keep Community Facilities working! If you're willing to offer your talents at a Community Facility, please select one here. You can also click the Wheel of Fortune any time to select a Community Facility to help maintain.
The Island is getting darker, so the Mayor has introduced a new currency: Water Crystals
To earn Water Crystals, you can create Offers on the Community Facility you select. This activates the Community Facility and brings light to the Island!
Help the Island by adding your talents to a Community Facility. Press the arrows on left and right to select a Community Facility!
Tap on your Community Facility to examine it!

Welcome to your Community Facility! The Mayor is grateful for your participation! To activate your Community Facility, simply tap on it (instead of your character) to make an Offer. For every Offer you create on your Community Facility, you will recieve 100 Water Crystals!
Other Citizens may be making Offers on other Community Facilities. See if they can help you resolve monthly incidents. When you buy Offers at Community Facilities, the Island lights up!
You did not create an Offer!
Are you sure you don't want to create an offer?
You won't get Water Crystals and the Mayor must pay for to maintain the Community Facility!
Water Crystals are a complementary currency. You can't pay yet your taxes or your housing with it, but you can buy anything else you need to live!
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the Gardens.
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the Production Zone.
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the Lake Park.
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the park.
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the Meeting Tree.
Use this Public Resource to offer your talents in the Cultural Center.
Waiting for other players to finish their incidents...
Wait and listen to your mayor!
5000 years old, free radical (no partner), no progeny
Hobbies: Playing with extraterrestrial pet (Levix), leading talk clusters, helping friends
6230 years old, twice partnered, two grown progeny
3367 years old, in a partner relationship, one progeny
Education: Level 3 training, some experience in many sectors
Hobbies: Rock climbing, hex games, refraction shows
Hobbies: Mountain climbing, pond building, gardening
4398 years old, one lifepartner, two neoprogeny
Hobbies: Herb collecting, creating recipes, caring for farm insects
3085 years old, unpartnered, two young progeny
Education: Level 5 training, experience in molecular energy
Education: Level 5 training in social abundance
Hobbies: mind-melding, foraging wisdom caves, testing speech vibrations
After all, they should be prepared for their role as citizens of your island.
Recently, a few new citizens have joined your community. It would be best for you to introduce them to one another and to show them around in the island.
Terra level with shared garden, soon needs repair.
Terra level with balcony soft star orientation, soon needs repair.
Sky level with access to roof, soft star orientation, roof needs repair.
Sky level with balcony medium star orientation, clean and in good condition.
Mid level with balcony and strong star orientation, soon needs repair.
Sky level with access to roof, strong star orientation, good condition.
Mid level with no balcony, medium star orientation, in good repair.
Terra level with balcony, strong star orientation, good condition.
Mid level with balcony, strong star orientation, soon needs repair.
Mid level, close to community center, good condition, nice and clean.
You have no job for no particular reason.
Has an assistant and an office.
Has their own office in the mining sector.
Provides services from shared office space.
Maintains beauty in buildings and grounds.
You manage the island's projects, budget and the wellbeing of your citizens.
You're very good at fixing stuff.
You have a talent in everything machine and computer related.
You have a natural talent for growing things and taking care for plants.
You know a lot about medicine and healing.
You are a very talented entertainer and musician.
You are an excellent provider of special foods and drinks.You can provide food for other people!
You are very organized and able to work with all types of beings.
You love knowledge and like to share it with everyone.You can help with all kinds of tricky quetsions.
You have to pay to maintain the common areas, collect commons fees from the citizens, provide support for those in need, and overall, you guide everyone in this game.
Pay 300.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
You won in the commons game!
You didn't quite get the jackpot, but 250.- is still really nice.
The storm damaged several older buildings, and smashed some windows and crystals.
Your parents gave you some money to spend on this special day.
You found some extra money in your coat pocket. Who put it there?
You found some leftovers. Lucky you!
Your neighbour cooked too much and gave you the leftovers.
Your mom brought some food over. Nice!
Your dad brought some food over. Nice!
Pay 400.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 200.- for crystal tuning or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 200.- for crystal tuning or find help in your neighborhood.
Your computing crystal won't turn on
Pay 400.- for a machine service or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 300.- for a repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
An invasive virus distorts your crystal shaper
How did that happen? Pay 300.- for a repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 200.- for new ones or find help in your neighborhood.
A neighbor complained about this. Pay 300.- for a garden service or find help in your neighborhood.
Buy new ones for 200.- to keep your living space fresh aired or ask a friend to revive them.
Could it be a rash? Pay 200.- for a healer or find help in your neighborhood.
Luckily there is a medicine for that! Pay 300.- for the anti-cold or find help in your neighborhood.
You have bright pink dots in your face
Pay 200.- for an elixir or find help in your neighborhood.
You forgot to organize your small nephews birthday party
You found a professional entertainer, but they want a 'last minute bonus'. Pay them 200.- or find help in your neighborhood.
A niece asked you to organize something special for her coming of age party
Rent a a bouncy castle for 300.- or find help in your neighborhood.
Your friend wishes something special for her upcoming partnership ceremony.
Organize a group who specializes in partnership ceremony dance calligraphy for 400.-, or find help in your neighborhood.
You acquire the talent of "Crystal Tuning"!
You took a workshop in how to fix things. Collect your certificate this month!
You acquire the talent of "Molecular Programming"
You took a workshop in how to handle technology. Collect your certificate this month!
You took a workshop in how to plant and grow stuff. Collect your certificate this month!
You acquire the talent of growing "Medicinal Herbs"
You took a workshop in how to heal and help others. Collect your certificate this month!
You acquire the talent of "Melody Maker"
You took a workshop in entertainment. Collect your certificate this month!
A furry insect ate all your sweets!
You have to buy new sweets for 200.- to restock or find help in your neighborhood.
Your Mum watched some 'free' holo movies online
Now she gets sued by a shady company. Get a counselor for 400.- to solve this or find help in your neighborhood.
Your ressource plan is very limited.
Pay a counselor 300.- to help you maximize your ressources, or find help in your neighborhood.
The annual window for changing your health insurance is open.
To find the the best healing advice, make an appointment with consultant for 200.-, or find help in your neighborhood.
Your friends and you have an argument about sector communication.
Visit a course about communication for 400.- or find help in your neighborhood.
Your neighbour found a strange geospecimen.
Now she wants to know what this is. Find a geologist for 200.- or find help in your neighborhood.
Your nephew struggles with level 1 training.
Pay 300.- to help your sister pay his extra lessons or provide private tutoring.
You learned how to be a "Star Cook"!
You took a workshop in how to cook and handle food. Collect your certificate this month!
You took a workshop in how to organize stuff profesionnally. Collect your certificate this month!
You took a workshop in "everything-you-need-to-know-about-everything". Collect your certificate this month!
To clean the affected areas of town,
To secure the hillside at the edge of town,
Pay 200.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 400.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
You dropped your favorite viewing crystal
Pay 300.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 300.- for repair service or find help in your neighborhood.
You are having trouble setting up your wireless communication device.
Pay 400.- for installation help or find help in your neighborhood.
You need a new focus for your computation crystal.
Pay 200.- for installation help or find help in your neighborhood.
You want to buy your significant other some flowers.
Pay 200.- for flowers or find help in your neighborhood.
You find some toxic mold growing!
Pay 400.- for help remiving it or find help in your neighborhood.
You want to start your own garden.
Pay 200.- for help or find help in your neighborhood.
You stubbed your toe really bad!
Pay 200.- to see a doctor or find help in your neighborhood.
You find a strange lump growing from your arm.
Pay 300.- to see a doctor or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 400.- to see a dentist or find help in your neighborhood.
You need to hire an entertainer for your party!
Pay 300.- to hire one or find help in your neighborhood.
You need to hire a singer for an event.
Pay 400.- to hire one or find help in your neighborhood.
You need a clown for an event.
Pay 200.- to hire one or find help in your neighborhood.
You need help organizing a charity event.
Pay 200.- to find help or find help in your neighborhood.
Pay 300.- to find help or find help in your neighborhood.
You need help organizing a community event
Pay 400.- to hire one or find help in your neighborhood.
You find a strange and mysterious old book in a strange language.
Pay 200.- to hire someone to translate it or find help in your neighborhood.
You find a strange ooze growing in your house. It seems alive.
Pay 300.- to hire someone to identify it or find help in your neighborhood.
You find a ancient fossil in your garden.
Pay 400.- to hire someone to identify it or find help in your neighborhood.
You made it to month {0} of {1}!
The following Citizens ended up with negative balance. If this happens again, the Citizen will not survive and the darkness will encroach upon all of you.
You didn't manage to help the following players
The island was not able to pay for at least {0} facilities! If this happens again you will lose the game!
Better luck next time! You will have to wait until the others complete the game and watch what happens!
Better luck next time! You will need to work together to win this game. Talk about your individual needs and resources and try to keep the Island alive as a community!
As a community you managed to balance your resources and needs. You did a great job at keeping the Island alive. Well done.
Congratulations, you made it to the end of the game!
It looks like you lost connection to the game server. Check your network connection and try to restart...
Citizens are now seeing which Community Facilities they want to adopt. You will no longer need to pay maintenance on a Community Facility selected by a Citizen. So encourage them to participate!
We will now introduce the complementary currency "Water Crystals".
You can't select another Community Facility.
You can't remove offers from Community Facilities.
You are invited to discuss your experience with your fellow players. With what did you struggle? How did Water Crystals change the Island?
Do you want to help us?
You can send us the data of how you played the game anonymously. This will help us improve the game and increase it's learning effect. Ask all the players if they will agree.
Uh oh, it looks like you don't have enough money to pay for this building!
Allow water crystals to partially pay for taxes
Players are able to own buildings
“Congratulations! You guided Crystal Island through the darkest of times. You worked with citizens and prospered together.”
“Well done! You kept the community working, even in challenging times.”
“You were a selfless mayor. You supported your citizens even when funds were low. Good try!”
“Instead of supporting citizens in need, you accumulated Gold. Unfortunately, when some fail, everyone fails.”
Crystal Guardian -- Magnificent! You used your talents to prosper and help others.
Community Builder -- Fantastic! You saw opportunities and supported your community.
Talent Shaper -- Awesome! You really applied your talents to solve problems.
Resource Explorer -- Terrific! You worked to meet your needs and help others.
Trade Maker -- Wonderful! You collaborated with others so everyone wins!
Talent Builder -- Bravo! You applied your talents and built the community, but not quite enough. Next time you'll do it!
Community Shaper -- Right on! You helped out the Mayor, but not quite enough. Next time you'll do it!
Resource Explorer -- Cool! You solved some problems, but not quite enough. Next time you'll do it!
Crystal Trader -- Nice! You worked with your talents, but not quite enough. Next time you'll do it!
Crystal Keeper -- OK! You survived a few rounds, but not quite enough. Next time you'll do it!
